Text.Page:
Those Sihran ragers have seized Mount Tyrannas and are harrying our supply chain.

I need you to take out Sihran {@LinkCreature:32#1#fighters} and {@LinkCreature:32#3#berserkers}, and those {@LinkCreature:32#2#tuwangi hornheads} to slow them down.

Let Kamese know if you're successful.
Well done! We'll send in soldiers to finish up the rest.
